attributes.action: get Folarin to come back to Cambridge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition Tony Blair to bring back our friend to Cambridge, he doesn't belong in London. We believe that if we create the correct economic conditions (i.e. pay him) he may well return. There would be a substantial benefit to the local economy as he did support many of the local dealers of dried fish.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
